meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by hemorrhoids.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a cream for my hemorrhoidal discomfort.
meanings.sent2: She experienced hemorrhoidal pain after sitting for too long.
meanings.sent3: The hemorrhoidal cushion made the uncomfortable chair bearable.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam was a hemorrhoidal experience for commuters.
meanings.sent5: The hemorrhoidal symptoms were impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: His hemorrhoidal diet contributed to his health issues.
meanings.sent2: The hemorrhoidal condition made her daily routine challenging.
meanings.sent3: The hemorrhoidal cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing inbox was a hemorrhoidal problem for the office.
meanings.sent5: The hemorrhoidal situation required immediate attention.
